version_description:
We thank you for your feedback and support for Lightbot!

Finally! Playable character Girlbot added! As well as, new language instructions added in German, Polish, Danish, Croatian, Dutch, Slovak, Czech, Greek and Italian!

Also covers a few graphics bugs that dealt with non-HD imagery appearing on HD devices.

Significantly reduced file size for all devices.
Included optimizations and removed crashes for older devices with lower memory.

Thanks again for supporting Lightbot!

Fixed a few minor bugs, including a major crash bug on iPhone 4 in which the game wouldn't start on that device.

As always, thank you for supporting Lightbot!

Fixed a few minor bugs, including a major crash bug on iPhone 4 in which the game wouldn't start on that device.

As always, thank you for supporting Lightbot!
